name: H O U S T O N
name_original: H O U S T O N
description:
content warnings: profanity, references to mental health stuffs

how to play: 

  1. open this page in Google Chrome, if you haven't already
  2. hover on things, click on things
  3. collect all the letters you need to advance to your destination!

music: "the seas are rising, are we?" by willow

other: this is absolutely based on a true story about going to Austin, so naturally I called the game Houston

created for the extra credits game jam #4 as i am the event coordinator
